description: This easy recipe is great for an alfresco lunch or dinner. Simply chargrill store-bought zucchini slice and serve with garlic bread and our easy bean salad.
keywords: Easy Charred Zucchini Slice With Tomato & Bean Salad
name: Easy Charred Zucchini Slice With Tomato & Bean Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine beans, tomato and remaining oil in a large bowl. Season. Scatter zucchini slice with basil and season with pepper. Serve with bean salad and garlic bread.
